short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance and manipulate images directly in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Enhancer is a powerful Chrome extension that lets you edit and enhance images directly in your browser. With features like resizing, cropping, flipping, and rotating, it offers a simple, efficient way to adjust your images without the need for complex software.

How to Use Image Enhancer:
1. Open the Editor: Click the Image Enhancer icon in your Chrome toolbar.
2. Upload an Image: Select "Choose File" to upload an image from your computer.
3. Edit with Ease: Access a variety of editing tools in the toolbar:
    - Resize: Adjust the width and height of your image. You can lock the aspect ratio to maintain proportions.
    - Crop: Use the crop box to select a portion of the image. Adjust the size using the handles or enter precise dimensions.
    - Flip & Rotate: Flip your image horizontally or rotate it 90 degrees to the left or right.
4. Resizing:
    - Enter the new dimensions for width and height.
    - Click "Resize Image" to apply your changes.
5. Cropping:
    - Drag the crop box or adjust the handles to define the area you want.
    - Click "Apply Crop" to finalize the crop.
6. Flipping & Rotating:
    - Use the flip and rotate buttons to flip horizontally or rotate the image.
7. Save Your Work: Once satisfied with your edits, click "Download Image" to save the enhanced version to your computer.

Image Enhancer makes quick image editing accessible right from your browser. Whether youâ€™re resizing images for social media, cropping photos for presentations, or making fast adjustments, our extension has everything you need.
